channel-type.description: The number of long power failures.

channel-type.label: Power Failure Log Entries
channel-type.description: Number of log entries.

channel-type.label: Power Failure End
channel-type.description: Timestamp when the power failure ended. There can be multiple log entries. Each entry has its own channel (emeter_power_failure_log_timestamp*x*, *x* = 0 - 9)

channel-type.label: Power Failure Duration
channel-type.description: Duration of the power failure. Each entry has its own channel (emeter_power_failure_log_duration*x*, *x* = 0 - 9)
